snippet.title: Everlife: Chapter 2 Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Chapter 2 is coming along well, here's a small gameplay teaser for the upcoming continuation. ;)

Everlife: Chapter 2 is arriving Spring 2022 (That could not have aged much more poorly, but hopefully soon :/, much sad)

Download Game: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1754480/Everlife/

Wishlist chapter 2: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1923100/Everlife_Chapter_2/
